summary: Japanese Translation of Chesko's "SwiftPotion - AutoPotion System"
descriptionHtml:
Author:Chesko
Translator:Sifka

This is a translation file of SwiftPotion

SwiftPotion is a Auto-Potion System mod originaly made by Chesko.
It adds a new, highly configurable auto-potion system. With it, you can stay healed and refreshed without interrupting your gameplay to drink potions in the heat of battle.
SwiftPotionはCheskoさんによって作成されたMODです。
一定量までHPやMPが減るとキャラクターが自動的にポーションを使います。
どの程度まで減ったら使うのか細かく設定が出来ます。

[必須//Requirements]
*SwiftPotion Auto-Potion System: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18027
--Japanese translation file does not contain Chesko_SwiftPotion.BSA, so that you will need to download original SwiftPotion from above link.

[使い方//how to use]
オリジナルを通常の手順でインストールします。
オリジナルのespファイルを日本語版のespファイルで上書きします。

[Thanks and Credit]
Chesko, thank you for allowing me to translate!

[Tools]
Skyrim Strings Localizer
author: Sifka
